member.summary: Gets the total number of columns.

member.summary: Gets the number of rows

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.GdalImageSource.GetBitmap(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This returns the window of data as a bitmap.
member.param: The zero based integer index of the first row (Y).
The zero based integer index of the first column (X).
The number of rows to read.
The number of columns to read.
The integer overview. 0 for the original image. Each successive index divides the length and height in half.
member.returns: The bitmap representation for the specified portion of the raster.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.GdalImageSource.GetSizes
member.summary: Gets the dimensions of the original (0) plus any overlays. The overlays get smaller as the index gets larger.
member.returns: The sizes.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.GdalImageSource.ReadWindow(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the data from the file in the form of ARGB bytes, regardless of how the image data is actually stored in the file.
member.param: The zero based integer index of the first row (Y)
The zero based integer index of the first column (X)
The number of rows to read
The number of columns to read
The integer overview. 0 for the original image. Each successive index divides the length and height in half.
member.returns: A Byte of values in ARGB order and in row-major raster-scan sequence

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.GdalImageSource.ReadHeader
member.summary: Gets the size of the whole image, but doesn't keep the image open unless it was already open.

member.summary: Returns ARGB 32 bpp regardless of the fact that the original is palette buffered.
member.param: The start row.
The start column.
The number of rows.
The number of columns.
The overview.
member.returns: The data that was read.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.GdalRaster`1.GetValuesT(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Int64})
member.summary: Most reading is optimized to read in a block at a time and process it. This method is designed for seeking through the file. It should work faster than the buffered methods in cases where an unusually arranged collection of values are required. Sorting the list before calling this should significantly improve performance.
member.param: A list or array of long values that are (Row * NumRowsInFile + Column)
member.returns: The values.

member.summary: Reads values from the raster to the jagged array of values
member.param: The horizontal offset from the left to start reading from
The vertical offset from the top to start reading from
The number of cells to read horizontally
The number of cells ot read vertically
member.returns: A jagged array of values from the raster

member.param: A jagged array of values to write to the raster

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.GdalRasterProvider.Create(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Type,System.String[])
member.summary: This create new method implies that this provider has the priority for creating a new file. An instance of the dataset should be created and then returned. By this time, the fileName will already be checked to see if it exists, and deleted if the user wants to overwrite it.
member.param: The string fileName for the new instance.
The string short name of the driver for creating the raster.
The number of columns in the raster.
The number of rows in the raster.
The number of bands to create in the raster.
The data type to use for the raster.
The options to be used.
member.returns: An IRaster

member.name: T:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.MapSelfLoadGroup
member.summary: This layer can be used to add groups to the map that load themselves on deserialization.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.MapSelfLoadGroup.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.MapSelfLoadGroup.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The path of the file that containes the layer data.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.MapSelfLoadGroup.DataSet
member.summary: Gets or sets the internal data set. This can be null, as in the cases of groups or map-frames. Copying a layer should not create a duplicate of the dataset, but rather it should point to the original dataset. The ShallowCopy attribute is used so even though the DataSet itself may be cloneable, cloning a layer will treat the dataset like a shallow copy.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.MapSelfLoadGroup.Filename
member.summary: Gets or sets the file name of a file based data set. The file name should be the absolute path including the file extension. For data sets coming from a database or a web service, the Filename property is NULL.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.MapSelfLoadGroup.FilePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the current file path. This is the relative path relative to the current project folder. For data sets coming from a database or a web service, the FilePath property is NULL. This property is used when saving source file information to a DSPX project.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.MapSelfLoadGroup.Layers
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of layers.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.MapSelfLoadGroup.LayerNames
member.summary: Gets a list that contains the names of the layers in this group. This is used to load only those layers when deserializing a dspx file.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.MapSelfLoadGroup.UseStaticOpenMethod
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the serializer should use the static open method or the constructor on deserializing the MapSelfLoadGroup. Do not remove this. This is used to write the relevant informations to the dspx.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.MapSelfLoadGroup.Open(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: This static method is only meant to be used by the deserializer. It allows the deserializer to reload the group layer with the layers that were contained on serializing.
member.param: Path of the file that contains the group that gets loaded.
The names of the layers that should be loaded.
member.returns: The opened group.

member.name: T:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.MapSelfLoadLineLayer
member.summary: This MapLineLayer is able to load itself on deserialization even if the contained DataSet doesn't know how to load the file.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets or sets the file name of a file based data set. The file name should be the absolute path including the file extension. For data sets coming from a database or a web service, the Filename property is NULL.

member.summary: Gets or sets the current file path. This is the relative path relative to the current project folder. For data sets coming from a database or a web service, the FilePath property is NULL. This property is used when saving source file information to a DSPX project.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.MapSelfLoadLineLayer.UseStaticOpenMethod
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the serializer should use the static open method or the constructor on deserializing the FeatureSet. This should only be true if a FeatureSet was added to the Map. Shapefiles can be loaded via constructor. Do not remove this. This is used to write the relevant informations to the dspx.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.MapSelfLoadLineLayer.Open(System.String)
member.summary: This static method is only meant to be used by the deserializer.
member.param: Path of the file that contains the layer that gets loaded.
member.returns: The opened layer.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.MultiLayerDataSet.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that is loaded from the supplied fileName.
member.param: The string fileName of the MultiLayerDataSet to load.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.MultiLayerDataSet.GetLayer
member.summary: Gets the IMapSelfLoadLayer that contains all the DataSets as Layers and can be added to the map.
member.returns: Null, if there are no DataSets, a MapSelfLoadLayer if there is only 1 DataSet otherwise a MapSelfLoadGroup with layers for the existing DataSets.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.MultiLayerDataSet.GetLayer(System.String[])
member.summary: Gets the IMapSelfLoadLayer that contains all the DataSets as Layers and can be added to the map.
member.param: The names of the layers that should be loaded. If this is null all layers get loaded.
member.returns: Null, if there are no DataSets, a MapSelfLoadLayer if there is only 1 DataSet otherwise a MapSelfLoadGroup with layers for the existing DataSets.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.MultiLayerDataSet.Open(System.String)
member.summary: Opens the given file.
member.param: Name of the file that should be opened.

member.name: T:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.OgrDataReader
member.summary: OgrDatareader provide readonly forward only access to OsGeo data sources accessible though the OGR project.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The path of the data source file.

member.summary: Translates the style strings from the list to DotSpatial style categories and adds them to the given layer.
member.param: The layer the styles get added to.
The style strings that should get translated.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.OgrDataReader.Dispose
member.summary: This disposes the underlying data source.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.OgrDataReader.GetLayers
member.summary: Gets the layers of the given file.
member.returns: List with the layers of the file.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.OgrDataReader.AddFeatures(DotSpatial.Data.IFeatureSet,System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String},OSGeo.OGR.Layer,OSGeo.OGR.FeatureDefn,System.Collections.Generic.IList{DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.OgrDataReader.Column})
member.summary: Adds the features for the other file types.
member.param: The featureset the features get added to.
The list the styles get added to.
The layer to get the features from.
The feature definition that contains the field count.
The list of columns used to fill the datarow.

member.summary: Adds the features for the dxf files.
member.param: The list of featuresets the features get added to.
The list of lists the styles get added to.
The layer to get the features from.
The number of field contained in the features datarow.
The list of columns used to fill the datarow.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.OgrDataReader.GetAngle(System.String@)
member.summary: Gets the angle.
member.param: The style to get the angle from. The parameter part gets removed from it.
member.returns: 0 if no angle was found otherwise the angle that was found.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.OgrDataReader.GetColor(System.String@,DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.OgrDataReader.Parameter)
member.summary: Gets the color.
member.param: The style to get the color from. The parameter part gets removed from it.
The parameter whose color should be returned.
member.returns: Black color / white fill color if nothing was found otherwise the color that was found.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.OgrDataReader.GetDashStyle(System.String@,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Gets the DashStyle.
member.param: The style to get the DashStyle from. The parameter part gets removed from it.
This out value indicates whether the color should be turned to transparent. This is needed for ogr-pen-1 which is an invisible pen.
member.returns: Solid if nothing was found otherwise the DashStyle best fitting to the ogr-pen that was found.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.OgrDataReader.GetFontName(System.String@)
member.summary: Gets the font name.
member.param: The style to get the color from. The parameter part gets removed from it.
member.returns: Null, of no font was found otherwise the name of the font that was found.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.OgrDataReader.GetFontSize(System.String@)
member.summary: Gets the font size. This gets only the numeric value without the units.
member.param: The style to get the font size from. The parameter part gets removed from it.
member.returns: 1 if no font size was found otherwise the font size that was found.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.OgrDataReader.GetGeometry(OSGeo.OGR.Feature)
member.summary: Gets the features geometry as Wkb.
member.param: Feature whose geometry is returned.
member.returns: The features geometry.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.OgrDataReader.GetNumber(System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Gets the numeric value of the given string. This can only be used for strings that contain a single number.
member.param: The string whose number should be returned.
The default value that should be returned if nothing was found or number parsing went wrong.
member.returns: 1 if no number was found otherwise the number that was found.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.OgrDataReader.GetOrientation(System.String@)
member.summary: Gets the orientation of the label.
member.param: The style to get the orientation from. The parameter part gets removed from it.
member.returns: MiddleCenter if nothing was found otherwise the orientation that was found.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.OgrDataReader.GetPattern(System.String@)
member.summary: Gets the pattern. This gets only the numeric values without the units.
member.param: The style to get the pattern from. The parameter part gets removed from it.
member.returns: Null if nothing was found otherwise the pattern values.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.OgrDataReader.GetProjectionInfo(OSGeo.OGR.Layer)
member.summary: Adds the projection info of the OGR layer to the FeatureSet.
member.param: The layer that is used to create the FeatureSet.
member.returns: Null on error otherwise the ProjectionInfo object that contains the data of the layers proj4 string.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.OgrDataReader.GetSubString(System.String@,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the substring of the given parameter followed by a comma.
member.param: Style to get the substring from.
The name of the parameter.
member.returns: An empty string if nothing was found otherwise the substring that was extracted.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.OgrDataReader.GetToolNames(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the names of the tools contained in the given style together with the corresponding styles parts.
member.param: The style that gets separated.
member.returns: A dictionary that contains all the tool names found in the style together with the substring belonging to the tool.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.OgrDataReader.GetValue(System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.IList{DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.OgrDataReader.Column},OSGeo.OGR.Feature)
member.summary: Gets the value of the field.
member.param: Index of the field.
Schema that contains the field type.
The feature whose value gets returned.
member.returns: The field value as object.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.OgrDataReader.GetValue(System.String@,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the value of the parameter with the given name. The name must contain the : at the end.
member.param: The style that gets searched. The parameter part gets removed from it.
The name of the paramater whose value should be returned.
member.returns: Null if nothing could be found otherwise the value that was found.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.OgrDataReader.GetWidth(System.String@)
member.summary: Gets the width. This gets only the numeric value without the units.
member.param: The style to get the width from. The parameter part gets removed from it.
member.returns: 1 if no width was found otherwise the width that was found.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Data.Rasters.GdalExtension.OgrDataReader.RemoveText(System.String)
member.summary: Removes all the unused parameters from Label styles.
member.param: Style that should be cleaned.
member.returns: The whole style for non label styles otherwise the cleaned style.
